alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft; Saguache County West of Continental Divide Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:33PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rio Grande, western Saguache and northeastern Mineral Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 132 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms over the Saguache Mountains, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
